categories: Category:Imperial Army personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Tek'lor was a female Human who served as a soldier in the Imperial Army of the reconstituted Sith Empire. During the Galactic War, she was stationed at Dorn Base on the planet Hoth.
Tek'lor appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Crew Skill Trade Vendor for Imperial players on Hoth.
